channel.title: DJ Kingpin & Snax... "The Stronghold" podcast archive
channel.description: DJ Kingpin & Snax, Live & Direct, all up in your face yo. hip hop & R&B. we bringin 40's back!.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast show hosted by DJ Kingpin & Snax Boogie
channel.itunes:author: DJ Kingpin
channel.itunes:summary: DJ Kingpin & Snax, Live & Direct, all up in your face yo. hip hop & R&B. we bringin 40's back!.

item.title: DJ Kingpin and Snax: Ep#10 Hiphop: vintage Jay-z vs Nas
item.description: The long awaited, popular demanded, heavily requested Vintage Jay-z Vs Vintage Nas show. Listen to DJ Kingpin and Snax Argue over who went commercial first, Jay-z? or Nas?... You Decide!
item.dc:creator: DJ Kingpin
item.itunes:summary:
The long awaited, popular demanded, heavily requested Vintage Jay-z Vs Vintage Nas show.
Listen to DJ Kingpin and Snax Argue over who went commercial first, Jay-z? or Nas?... You Decide!

item.title: DJ Kingpin and Snax: Ep#9 The comeback show !
item.description: 01 - 00:00 - Dj Kingpin & Snax intro 02 - 02:27 - Sheek louch - Good love 03 - 05:38 - Juganot feat. Joell Ortiz, Uncle Murder and Tess - EN WHY CEE {NYC} 04 - 07:07 - Juganot feat. Swizz Beats, Busta Rhymes, Fat Joe & Reek Da Villain - En Why Ceequal 05 - 12:07 - Grafh - Exclusive Freestyle 06 - 14:45 - lloyd banks - another 70 07 - 17:47 - shortbus alumni - spitshine 08 - 21:20 - Dj Kingpin & Snax on rumors 09 - 24:00 - Styles P - blow my mind remix ft jadakiss & sheek 10 - 27:22 - Red cafe - Paper touchin 11 - 30:06 - Rick Ross ft T Pain - Boss 12 - 31:49 - Rick Ross feat. DJ Khaled, Plies, Birdman, Busta Rhymes, Webbie, Gorilla Zoe, Fat Joe, Torch & Gunplay (of Triple C's), Flo-Rida, Brisco, Lil Wayne, DJ Drama & Bigga Rankin - Speedin (Remix) 13 - 37:48 - MC Lyte - old school bounce 14 - 39:44 - AZ - incredible 15 - 43:16 - Termanology ft red cafe - bam bam 16 - 46:10 - DJ Kingpin & Snax outro

item.title: DJ Kingpin and Snax: Ep#8 Dancehall Reggae show
item.description: below is the long list of reggae dancehall songs we played in this podcast show; riddim names: tremmor riddim, full draw riddim, gangsta riddim, supacharge riddim, chromatic riddim, shooter riddim, bee hive riddim, show off riddim + many more 1 - dj kingpin & snax horn crazy intro 2 - movado - last night 3 - tony matterhorn - hot fuck 4 - sizzla - bullet 5 - bounty killer - bullet proof skin 6 - chino - change 7 - mr lexxus aka mr lex - clockwork 8 - shema - first lady of the ship 9 - mr easy - have you ever 10 - voicemail - hype pon yuh matie 11 - tony 'mentally ill' matterhorn - talk di tings dem 12 - elephant man - more 13 - tok (t.o.k.) - original 14 - beenie man - no no 15 - lady saw - weh dem man deh 16 - aidonia - yuh vagina tight 17 - movado - which gyal 18 - junior reid - one blood 19 - movado - dying 20 - vybz kartel - empire army 21 - sean paul - pick it up and drop it 22 - sean paul - watch them roll 23 - elephant man - drop dead 24 - aidonia - ras it up 25 - movado - amazing grace 26 - movado - chiney k 27 - elephant man - shake up yuh booty 28 - tony matterhorn - running cow 29 - wayne marshall - be by myself 30 - shema - just wanna have fun 31 - vybz kartel - nah run 32 - nikki - high 33 - elephant man ft demarco - our world 34 - munga - mi nuh see 35 - munga - cyzh defend themself 36 - mavado - guns out 37 - vybz kartel - weh dem feel like 38 - mad cobra - watch face 39 - elephant man - boom! 40 - elephant man ft swizz beats - jump 41 - Dj Kingpin & Snax - outro 42 - t.o.k. - full draw
item.dc:creator: DJ Kingpin

item.title: DJ Kingpin and Snax: Ep#3 The R+B Expo part 1

item.title: DJ Kingpin and Snax: Ep#1 hiphop show part 1
item.description: This is DJ Kingpin mixing live, with Snax as my co-host, here's a list of songs played: 1 - 00:00 kingpin & snax intro 2 - 01:44 Statik selectah - express yourself 3 - 05:10 talib kweli - hot thing 4 - 08:00 mims - 9/11 5 - 11:30 noe - deeper 6 - 12:40 saigon - come on baby 7 - 15:30 50 cent - smile 8 - 19:00 i get money intro 9 - 20:50 50 cent ft jay-z , p diddy - i get money forbes 123 remix 10 - 23:00 50 cent milk dee - i get money remix 11 - 24:25 j bully - blam blam 12 - 27:43 game ft lil wayne - lyrical homicide 13 - 30:00 sheek ft jadakiss - survival 14 - 32:40 ice cold beer interlude 15 - 34:30 styles P - supa gangsta 16 - 37:00 lil wayne - something you forgot 17 - 41:15 red cafe ft nina sky - things you do 18 - 44:23 nore - get it in 19 - 46:50 ness - got it like that 20 - 49:24 myspace plugs 21 - 51:00 - j bully - doe boyyy 22 - 55:30 - bizzy bone - money 23 - 59:30 - kingpin & snax outro *24 - 63:49 - Bumps hollywood - i'm back freestyle (bonus track) ( disregard the below) My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-5900aadcbbc27d49e641be7e4af710ca}
